stories.original_summary: Researchers have built a realistic human mini spinal cord in the lab and used it to simulate traumatic injury. stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Mend Wounds with Magical Sinew Replica
stories.fantasy_story: In a grand breakthrough, the Alchemists' Guild has created a miniature enchanted lifethread, mimicking the body's vital sinews. They inflicted a grievous wound upon it to study how it mended. With the aid of swift healing dust, the magical sinew replica began to regrow its delicate lifethreads, offering new hope for those afflicted by great injury.

stories.fantasy_headline: Fiery Mind-Ache Makes Rat Behavior More Deliberate
stories.fantasy_story: For ages, peculiar compulsions were thought to be mere habits, but new findings from the Wizard's Guild reveal otherwise. A fiery mind-ache within a creature's seat of judgment can make actions more thoughtful, not less. This change is linked to the guiding spirits of the mind, the star-folk, reshaping understanding of these strange ailments.

stories.fantasy_headline: Shining Apple Clan Enhances Secret Runic Messages
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Clan of the Shining Apple has begun trials for enchanted scrying-mirrors to send messages sealed with powerful wards. Soon, both their enchanted mirrors and the speaking-stones of other clans can exchange secret missives. These messages will be protected by ancient runes, ensuring only the intended recipient can read them.

stories.original_summary: Apple is upgrading its Podcasts app to let users "seamlessly" swap between audio and video podcasts using its HTTP Live Streaming (HLS) technology. stories.fantasy_headline: Shining Apple Clan Unveils Fluid Tale-Telling Scrolls
stories.fantasy_story: The Clan of the Shining Apple is upgrading its tale-telling artifacts. Soon, listeners can fluidly shift between spoken sagas and moving portraits of the same show. Thanks to arcane streaming enchantments, one can even download these visual tales for later viewing, enhancing the experience of every recounted adventure.
